entries.name: Acid
entries.description: The corrosive spray of a black dragons breath and the dissolving enzymes secreted by a black pudding deal acid damage.

data.examples: The corrosive spray of a black dragons breath and the dissolving enzymes secreted by a black pudding deal acid damage.

entries.name: Bludgeoning
entries.description: Blunt force attacks - hammers, falling, constriction, and the like - deal bludgeoning damage.

data.examples: Blunt force attacks - hammers, falling, constriction, and the like - deal bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Cold
entries.description: The infernal chill radiating from an ice devils spear and the frigid blast of a white dragons breath deal cold damage.

data.examples: The infernal chill radiating from an ice devils spear and the frigid blast of a white dragons breath deal cold damage.

entries.name: Fire
entries.description: Red dragons breathe fire, and many spells conjure flames to deal fire damage.

data.examples: Red dragons breathe fire, and many spells conjure flames to deal fire damage.

entries.name: Force
entries.description: Force is pure magical energy focused into a damaging form. Most effects that deal force damage are spells, including magic missile and spiritual weapon.

data.examples: Force is pure magical energy focused into a damaging form. Most effects that deal force damage are spells, including magic missile and spiritual weapon.

entries.name: Lightning
entries.description: A *lightning bolt* spell and a blue dragons breath deal lightning damage.

data.examples: A *lightning bolt* spell and a blue dragons breath deal lightning damage.

entries.name: Necrotic
entries.description: Necrotic damage, dealt by certain undead and a spell such as chill touch, withers matter and even the soul.

data.examples: Necrotic damage, dealt by certain undead and a spell such as chill touch, withers matter and even the soul.

entries.name: Piercing
entries.description: Puncturing and impaling attacks, including spears and monsters bites, deal piercing damage.

data.examples: Puncturing and impaling attacks, including spears and monsters bites, deal piercing damage.

entries.name: Poison
entries.description: Venomous stings and the toxic gas of a green dragons breath deal poison damage.

data.examples: Venomous stings and the toxic gas of a green dragons breath deal poison damage.

entries.name: Psychic
entries.description: Mental abilities such as a mind flayers psionic blast deal psychic damage.

data.examples: Mental abilities such as a mind flayers psionic blast deal psychic damage.

entries.name: Radiant
entries.description: Radiant damage, dealt by a clerics *flame strike* spell or an angels smiting weapon, sears the flesh like fire and overloads the spirit with power.

data.examples: Radiant damage, dealt by a clerics *flame strike* spell or an angels smiting weapon, sears the flesh like fire and overloads the spirit with power.

entries.name: Slashing
entries.description: Swords, axes, and monsters claws deal slashing damage.

data.examples: Swords, axes, and monsters claws deal slashing damage.

entries.name: Thunder
entries.description: A concussive burst of sound, such as the effect of the *thunderwave* spell, deals thunder damage.

data.examples: A concussive burst of sound, such as the effect of the *thunderwave* spell, deals thunder damage.
